data.message: If and when FB starts charging for this trivia, I will also be leaving.  It is offering less and less to me these days.  I just don't care much for it these days.

replies.message: Hey Linda. Thanks for checking in with us. This campaign is a known hoax. If you see content like this on Facebook, please report it to us as spam by using these tips from our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1tedp33. -Chantal

We're sorry to hear that, Linda. We're working hard to ensure that our updates improve everyone's Facebook experience. Let us know what would make your experience more enjoyable at our feedback page: http://on.fb.me/1tee7gy -Elissa
